releaseNotes:
- Introduced Top, Trending, and Latest JioSaavn online playlists.

- Team Netra

changelog.text: Party Chat using Firebase Realtime Database with unread badges.
Musical Map with geo-tagged listening history and map markers.
Music Trivia Arena with offline snippet quiz, high scores, and QuizProvider logic.
Private Vault with biometric lock and isolated sembast store.
Integrate built-in Ringtone Cutter with waveform UI and FFmpeg trimming.
Democracy Queue with real-time voting and auto-sorted party playlist.
Audio Aura personas based on listening behavior analytics.
Netra Wrapped on-demand report with vibe score and shareable badges.
Time Machine calendar view for date-wise listening history.
Netra Wrapped with animated Story Mode and Discovery Ratio metric.
Audio Aura with visual mesh gradients, new personas, and skip/binge detection.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
